english.segment1: When my heart runs dry. And there's no song to sing. No holy melody. No words of love within. I recall the height from which. This fragile heart has slipped..
english.segment2: Chorus: And I'll remember You. I will turn back and do. The things I used to do. for the love of You. Lord, I'll remember You. I will turn back and do. The things I used to do. for the love of You
english.segment3: You are my soul's desire. You are the hope within. You bring my heart to life. You make my spirit sing. I recall the height from which. This fragile heart has slipped..
